creator: brian.bray@theradoc.com
text:
I have a starteam project, I'm trying to checkout a subfolder into the
${basedir} with is not the default specified in the starteam project.  It goes
crazy and tries to write the file to a wrong directory.

This task:
<stcheckout URL="${STARTEAM_URL}/TESA - Modules/"
  username="${STARTEAM_USERNAME}" password="${STARTEAM_PASSWORD}" 
  rootstarteamfolder="/KS3/" rootlocalfolder="${basedir}/"
  deleteuncontrolled="false" forced="true"/>

Tries to do this:

[stcheckout] Checking out: TESA - Modules\KS3\src\tdoc\frames\Frame_10041.java
-->
c:\dev\tesa-modules\C:\dev\tesa-modules\KS3\C:\dev\tesa-modules\KS3\src\C:\dev\tesa-modules\KS3\src\tdoc\C:\dev\tesa-modules\KS3\src\tdoc\frames\Frame_10041.java

Please check bug 18007.  I am guessing that you are using StarTeam 5.2 and
probably java sdk 1.4.1.  Am I right?

When I get a break in my day job, I am going to fix this.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18007 ***
creator: scohen@apache.org
brian.bray@theradoc.com
text: Actually I'm using starteam 5.1, but I am using java 1.4.1

REALLY!
I have been unable to replicate this behavior with StarTeam 5.1. I had thought
it was only a 5.2 problem and I don't have access to 5.2.

Okay, I'd like you to try a couple of things.
1) Try specifying rootstarteamfolder as "/KS3" instead of "/KS3/"
2) How is ${basedir} defined?  The usual "."?  For research purposes, please try
specifying it fully.

Do either of these help?
creator: scohen@apache.org

text:
Neither changed anything.  Attached is the stripped down build.xml file, the
output with for stdout and sterror and the informational .txt file that is
inside the starteam-sdk.jar file that's in the ant/lib directory.

Here is a more detailed analysis of the directory its trying to create as
related to my starteam project and local directory structure:

[stcheckout] Checking out: TESA - Modules\CDC\src\cdc\frames\Frame_10003.java
-->
c:\dev\tesa-modules\C:\temp\C:\temp\src\C:\temp\src\cdc\C:\temp\src\cdc\frames\Frame_10003.java


c:\dev\tesa-modules\    => This is the root folder as defined in the starteam
project.

C:\temp\                => The folder I specified in rootlocalfolder.

C:\temp\src\cdc\frames\Frame_10003.java  => The correct location where this file
should be checked out to.
creator: brian.bray@theradoc.com
brian.bray@theradoc.com
text:
Created attachment 6713
The output and support files.

Something is wrong with your attachment.  Your earlier attachment (6552) displays
as a text file in any browser.  I think you've incorrectly identified the type
of attachment 6713 - neither Mozilla nor IE will open it.

Please try again.
creator: scohen@apache.org
brian.bray@theradoc.com
text:
Created attachment 6715
.zip file containing files and output

I did just notice that by leaving out the rootlocalfolder parameter it works
fine, which is actually a decent workaround for me, and further confirms that
this is a duplicate of bug 18007
creator: brian.bray@theradoc.com
